title: 17-year-old boy shot in Fuller Park
content:
A 17-year-old boy was shot in the arm Tuesday night in the Fuller Park neighborhood on the South Side.
Just after 8 p.m., he was standing in front of a home in the 4400 block of South Wells when someone in a passing vehicle opened fire, Chicago Police said.
He was taken to Northwestern Memorial Hospital in good condition, police said.
